languages.text: "М? Тебя что-то не устраивает, кузина? Я обещал, что ты получишь своих драгоценных собратьев с мира-корабля. Так и будет. Я заберу тебя к ним. Возможно, даже поприсутствую при вашем радостном воссоединении".

traits.locale_text: "М? Тебя что-то не устраивает, кузина? Я обещал, что ты получишь своих драгоценных собратьев с мира-корабля. Так и будет. Я заберу тебя к ним. Возможно, даже поприсутствую при вашем радостном воссоединении".

languages.text: "Hmm? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."
languages.original_text: "М? Тебя что-то не устраивает, кузина? Я обещал, что ты получишь своих драгоценных собратьев с мира-корабля. Так и будет. Я заберу тебя к ним. Возможно, даже поприсутствую при вашем радостном воссоединении".

traits.locale_text: "Mm? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."

"Mm? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."

"M-m? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious Craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."

"M-m? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious Craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."

"Hmm? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."

"Hmm? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."

languages.text: « Hm ? N'êtes-vous pas satisfaite, ma chère ? J'ai promis que vous retrouveriez vos chers survivants du vaisseau-monde. Et ce sera le cas. Je vais vous conduire auprès d'eux. Je serai peut-être même là pour assister à vos réjouissantes retrouvailles. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."

traits.locale_text: « Hm ? N'êtes-vous pas satisfaite, ma chère ? J'ai promis que vous retrouveriez vos chers survivants du vaisseau-monde. Et ce sera le cas. Je vais vous conduire auprès d'eux. Je serai peut-être même là pour assister à vos réjouissantes retrouvailles. »

languages.text: “嗯嗯？难道你不满意吗，我的族人？我向你保证过，会带你见方舟世界的幸存者。别担心，我会带你去见他们的，说不定你们还会上演一场感人的亲人团聚呢。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."

traits.locale_text: “嗯嗯？难道你不满意吗，我的族人？我向你保证过，会带你见方舟世界的幸存者。别担心，我会带你去见他们的，说不定你们还会上演一场感人的亲人团聚呢。”

languages.text: 「ンンン？不満なのか、我が血族よ？俺は、大切な方舟の生存者たちをお前に会わせると約束しただろう。だから、そうするのだ。彼らのもとへ連れて行ってやる。歓喜の再会に立ち会えるかもしれんからな」
languages.original_text: "Hmm? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."

traits.locale_text: 「ンンン？不満なのか、我が血族よ？俺は、大切な方舟の生存者たちをお前に会わせると約束しただろう。だから、そうするのだ。彼らのもとへ連れて行ってやる。歓喜の再会に立ち会えるかもしれんからな」

languages.text: "Hmm? Seid Ihr zufrieden, Verwandte? Ich habe Euch versprochen, dass Ihr die kostbaren Überlebenden Eures Weltenschiffs treffen werdet. Und das werdet Ihr auch. Ich werde Euch zu ihnen bringen. Vielleicht werde ich sogar anwesend sein bei Eurer freudigen Wiedervereinigung."
languages.original_text: "Hmm? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm? Seid Ihr zufrieden, Verwandte? Ich habe Euch versprochen, dass Ihr die kostbaren Überlebenden Eures Weltenschiffs treffen werdet. Und das werdet Ihr auch. Ich werde Euch zu ihnen bringen. Vielleicht werde ich sogar anwesend sein bei Eurer freudigen Wiedervereinigung."

languages.text: «¿Oh? ¿Acaso no estás satisfecha, prima? Te prometí que te llevaría hasta los supervivientes de tu preciado mundo astronave. Y así será. Te reunirás con ellos. Incluso puede que yo mismo esté allí para presenciar vuestro jubiloso reencuentro».
languages.original_text: "Hmm? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."

traits.locale_text: «¿Oh? ¿Acaso no estás satisfecha, prima? Te prometí que te llevaría hasta los supervivientes de tu preciado mundo astronave. Y así será. Te reunirás con ellos. Incluso puede que yo mismo esté allí para presenciar vuestro jubiloso reencuentro».

languages.text: "Hımm? Bir şikâyetin mi var soydaşım? Gemidünyadan sağ kalanları bulmak, senin için her şeyden kıymetli değil miydi? Onları bulmanı sağlayacağıma söz vermiştim. Bulacaksın da. Seni onların yanına götüreceğim. Neşeyle birbirinize kavuştuğunuzda yanında olmayı düşünebilirim bile."
languages.original_text: "Hmm? Are you dissatisfied, my kin? I promised that you would have your precious craftworld survivors. And so you will. I will take you to them. I might even be there to witness your jubilant reunion."

traits.locale_text: "Hımm? Bir şikâyetin mi var soydaşım? Gemidünyadan sağ kalanları bulmak, senin için her şeyden kıymetli değil miydi? Onları bulmanı sağlayacağıma söz vermiştim. Bulacaksın da. Seni onların yanına götüreceğim. Hatta belki de neşeyle birbirinize kavuştuğunuzda yanında olurum."
